articles.author: Ryan Hogg
articles.title: Challenger brand Nothing is taking on Apple with a $350 smartphone that could cure your tech addiction - Fortune
articles.description: The Nothing 2(a) is the cheaper iteration of the growing tech company's buzzy smartphone targeted at minimalists.
articles.content: Nothing, the upstart tech brand with a cult following, has just launched a budget version of its much-hyped Nothing Phone (2), the Nothing (2a) in India. With 2.7 million sales and more than half a b… [+3327 chars]

articles.author: ET Online
articles.title: Nothing Phone (2A): Carl Pei's mid-range bet to woo Indian audience at Rs 23,999 - The Economic Times
articles.description: Nothing, a London-based tech brand, has just launched its most affordable smartphone yet, called the Phone 2a. It's priced starting from Rs 23,999 and comes with impressive features while keeping Nothing's signature transparent design. The Nothing Phone 2a is…
